DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to examine if healthy individuals that ingest St John's wort will have a significantly difference in glucose tolerance.
DOC.brief_title: Does the Natural Medicinal Plant St John's Wort Affect the Glucose Tolerance in Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: 1840 years Males Fasting plasmaglucose < 7.0 mmol/L Glycosylated haemoglobin A1c within reference or clinically insignificant deviation hereof Body mass index < 30 kg/m^2 Hypersensitivity to St John's wort Chronical or daily alcohol abuse Known liver disease Ingestion of drugs requiring prescription, except locally acting drugs
